123.info: "Songs for Saplings: 123" is designed to teach your little ones the word of God as they study their numbers. Songs 1-13 are about numbers, and songs 14-20 are about God's creation of the universe and His rest on the Sabbath.

001.info: "Questions with Answers Vol. 1: God and Creation" contains an overview of Scriptural truths about God and His creation. The songs teach who God is, what He did in creation, and why He did it. They also teach us who we are and how we should respond to Him.

002.info: "Questions with Answers Vol. 2: The Fall and Salvation" teaches what went wrong with the world and what God did to fix it. The songs give Scriptural explanations for where sin leads and how God saves.

003.info: "Questions with Answers Vol. 3: Christ and His Work" explains why God sent Jesus, what work Jesus did to accomplish our salvation, and what He does still today. The songs teach Scriptural truths about Jesus’ nature, what his roles (offices) are, and how he reconciled us to God.

004.info: "Questions with Answers Vol. 4: The Word of God" contains songs which help teach the Ten Commandments and the Greatest Commandment and why they are important. Additional songs explain how and why God gave us the Bible, why we should believe it, and why it is important for us.

005.info: "Questions with Answers Vol. 5: Prayer and the Sacraments" takes listeners through the Scriptural basics of prayer, baptism and the Lord's Supper. The songs about prayer focus on what prayer is and to whom we should pray, along with examining the different parts of The Lord’s Prayer. The songs about the sacraments teach the meaning and administration of baptism and the Lord’s Supper.

006.info: "Questions with Answers Vol. 6: Christ and His Return", the final volume of the series, teaches about the great joy and hope of our faith! These songs rejoice in the completed work of Christ and His promise to return and bring us into His eternal presence.

abc.info: "Songs for Saplings: ABC" is designed to teach your children the word of God as they study their ABCs. Parents and teachers will enjoy singing these simple songs with the little "saplings" in their care. Psalm 92:12

rec.line2: Free Guitar Chords, Lyrics, and Sheet Music

unk.line1: Can't find what you're looking for?

001.info: أسئلة وإجابات الألبوم الأول: الله والخليقة. يحتوي علي نظرة عامة عن الحقائق الكتابية حول الله والخليقة. تُعلم الاغاني من هو الله. ما فعله في الخلق. ولماذا فعل ذلك. آيضا تعلمنا من نحن وكيف يجب أن نتجاوب معه.

The Spanish translation of "Questions with Answers Vol. 1: God and Creation" contains an overview of Scriptural truths about God and His creation. The songs teach who God is, what He did in creation, and why He did it. They also teach us who we are and how we should respond to Him.

This Chichewa translation of "Questions with Answers Vol. 1: God and Creation" contains an overview of Scriptural truths about God and His creation. The songs teach who God is, what He did in creation, and why He did it. They also teach us who we are and how we should respond to Him.

002.info: This Chichewa translation of "Questions with Answers Vol. 2: The Fall and Salvation" talks about what went wrong with the world, and what God did to fix it.

003.info: “Khristu ndi ntchito zake” ikufotokoza chifukwa chimene Mulungu anatuma Yesu. Ntchito imene Yesu adagwira kukwanilitsa chipulumutso chathu ndi zimene akuchitabe mpakana lero. Nyimbozi zikuphuzitsa zoona zokhazokha kuchokera mmau a Mulungu za chikhalidwe cha Yesu, ntchito zake (mu ufumu wa Mulungu) komanso m’mene anatilumikizitsira ndi Mulungu. Zikomo

004.info: Mau a Mulungu ali ndi nyimbo zomwe zimathandizira kuphuzitsa Malamulo khumi a Mulungu komanso lamulo loposa ndi kufunikira kwakwe kwa izi. Nyimbo zina zoonjezera zikufotokoza m’mene mulungu anatipatsira ndi chifukwa chomwe anatipatsira Baibulo. Likufotokozanso chifukwa chomwe tiyenera kulikhulupilira komanso kuti ndilofunika bwanji kwa ife. Zikomo

001.info: Ce premier volume comprend un aperçu des vérités bibliques sur Dieu et Sa création. Les chants enseignent qui Dieu est, ce qu'Il a fait dans la création, et pourquoi Il l'a fait. Ils nous enseignent également qui nous sommes et quelle devrait être notre réponse face à Dieu.

002.line2: vol. 2: La chute et le salut
002.info: Ce deuxième volume nous apprend ce que s'est passé lors de la chute et ce que Dieu a fait pour y remédier. Les chants donnent des explications bibliques pour expliquer les conséquences du péché et la manière dont Dieu sauve.

003.info: Ce troisième volume explique pourquoi Dieu a envoyé Jésus, comment l'œuvre de Jésus accomplit notre salut, et ce qu'Il fait encore aujourd'hui. Les chants enseignent des vérités bibliques sur la nature de Jésus, ses rôles (fonctions), et la manière dont il nous a réconcilié à Dieu.

004.info: Ce quatrième volume inclut des chants qui aident à enseigner les dix commandements et expliquent leur importance. Des chants additionnels enseignent comment et pourquoi Dieu nous a donné la Bible, pourquoi nous devrions la croire, et pourquoi c'est important pour nous.

005.line2: vol. 5: La prière et les sacrements
005.info: Ce cinquième volume nous fait découvrir les bases bibliques de la prière, du baptême, et du Repas du Seigneur. Les chants sur la prière expliquent ce qu'est la prière et à qui nous devrions prier ; ils examinent également les différentes parties du "Notre Père". Les chants sur les sacrements enseignent le sens et l'administration du baptême et du Repas du Seigneur.

006.info: Ce sixième volume parle de la joie immense et de l'espérance merveilleuse de notre foi ! Ces chants nous amènent à nous réjouir de l'œuvre accomplie par Christ et de Sa promesse de revenir et de nous faire entrer dans Sa présence éternelle. Il est ressuscité ! Il est vraiment ressuscité !
